{{cpp/title|hash&lt;small&gt;(std::experimental::propagate_const)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/propagate_const/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/propagate_const}}
{{dcl|since=libfund_ts_2|1=
template&lt; class T &gt; struct hash&lt;std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

The template specialization of {{lc|std::hash}} for {{c|std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt;}} allows users to obtain hashes of objects of type {{c|std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt;}}.

For a given {{c|std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt; p}}, this specialization ensures that  {{c|1=std::hash&lt;std::experimental::propagate_const&lt;T&gt;&gt;()(p) == std::hash&lt;T&gt;()(p.t_)}}, where {{c|p.t_}} is the pointer-like object wrapped by {{tt|p}}.
